DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , open-label , randomized trial aim compare efficacy safety profile sodium alginate oral suspension ( 50mg/ml ) 20ml bedtime esomeprazole ( 40mg/tablet ) 1 tablet daily treatment erosive GERD patient Taiwan . Patients enrol study diagnose GERD ( grade A~D ) ; history heartburn ( regurgitation ) ≥ 3 month enter study ; history GERD-related sleep disturbance ≥ 1 month enter study ; nighttime heartburn ( regurgitation ) grade moderate , severe , ≥ 3 night last 7 day screen period ; GERD-related sleep disturbance ≥ 3 night last 7 day screen period ; global PSQI score > 5 ; sign informed consent . Patients exclude diagnosed non-erosive GERD , Barrett 's esophagus esophageal stricture ; condition GERD could primary cause sleep disturbance ; active esophageal , gastric duodenal ulcer ; history esophageal , gastric duodenal surgery ; active cancer kind ; female patient pregnant lactating ; allergy study drug ; take proton pump inhibitor ( PPI ) within 7 day , prokinetic agent , H2-blocker , alginate preparation antacid within 2 day screen ; history drug addiction alcohol abuse within past 12 month ; condition diseases investigator considers appropriate enter study . The primary efficacy endpoint percentage patient relief nighttime heartburn ( acid regurgitation ) . The secondary efficacy endpoint percentage patient complete resolution nighttime heartburn ( regurgitation ) ; percentage patient relief GERD-related sleep disturbance ; percentage patient complete resolution GERD-related sleep disturbance ; percentage night without nighttime heartburn ( regurgitation ) treatment period ; change baseline Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index questionnaire total score ( global PSQI score ) end study ; change percentage patient relief nighttime heartburn ( acid regurgitation ) post-treatment visit ( V4 ) compare final visit ( V3 ) test group ( Nexium plus Alginos ) . The safety endpoint incidence adverse event . This study aim prove sodium alginate plus esomeprazole superior esomeprazole alone relieve nighttime reflux symptom sleep disturbance erosive GERD patient .
